statements: SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT bias_vector FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_name='hidden';
SELECT DISTINCT layer_name FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY layer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_name = 'input_layer';
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY layer_name ASC;
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix, bias_vector FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_matrix[1] > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY weight_matrix[1] DESC;
SELECT layer_name, AVG(weight_matrix[1]) AS avg_weight FROM neural_network_weights GROUP BY layer_name HAVING AVG(weight_matrix[1]) > 0.3;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_layers;
SELECT layer_id, layer_name FROM neural_network_layers ORDER BY layer_id DESC;
SELECT layer_name, weights FROM neural_network_layers WHERE layer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM network_training_data WHERE layer_id = 2 AND output_data->>'accuracy' = 'high';
SELECT * FROM network_training_data ORDER BY data_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT layer_id, layer_name FROM neural_network_layers WHERE layer_id = 1;
SELECT layer_name, weights, biases FROM neural_network_layers ORDER BY layer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_training_data WHERE layer_id IN (SELECT layer_id FROM neural_network_layers WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer');
SELECT DISTINCT layer_name FROM neural_network_layers;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_layers FROM neural_network_layers;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_layers;
SELECT layer_name, weights FROM neural_network_layers WHERE layer_id = 1;
SELECT output_data FROM training_data WHERE training_id = 100;
SELECT training_id, loss FROM fine_tuning_logs WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT * FROM fine_tuning_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM fine_tuning_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT layer_name, weights FROM neural_network_layers WHERE layer_id = 2;
SELECT input_data, output_data FROM training_data WHERE training_id = 3;
SELECT layer_name, loss FROM neural_network_layers INNER JOIN fine_tuning_logs ON fine_tuning_logs.training_id = 1;
SELECT training_id, accuracy FROM fine_tuning_logs WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM layer_weights;
SELECT weights FROM layer_weights WHERE layer_id = 1;
SELECT activation_id, activation_value FROM neuron_activations ORDER BY activation_value DESC;
SELECT regularization_factor, learning_rate FROM fine_tuning_settings WHERE regularization_factor > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM layer_biases WHERE layer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM layer_weights ORDER BY layer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fine_tuning_settings WHERE regularization_factor > 0.5;
SELECT layer_id, biases FROM layer_biases WHERE layer_id = 2;
SELECT activation_id, activation_value FROM neuron_activations WHERE activation_value < 0.0 ORDER BY activation_value ASC;

SELECT network_name, network_id FROM neural_network ORDER BY network_id DESC;
